mapper.select:
SELECT a.oypdSeq , a.oypdCate , a.oypdBrand , a.oypdName , a.oypdPrice , a.oypdDelNy , b.oyspSeq , b.oyspSalePrice , b.oyspDelNy , b.oyspTypeCd
FROM oyProduct a LEFT JOIN oySaleProduct b on b.oypdSeq = a.oypdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND oypdDelNy = 0
SELECT oymbSeq , oymbId , oymbPassword , oymbDesc , oymbName FROM oyMember WHERE 1=1 AND oymbId=#{oymbId} AND oymbPassword=#{oymbPassword}

SELECT a.oypdSeq , a.oypdCate , a.oypdBrand , a.oypdName , a.oypdPrice , a.oypdDelNy , b.oyspSeq , b.oyspSalePrice , b.oyspDelNy , b.oyspTypeCd
FROM oyProduct a LEFT JOIN oySaleProduct b on b.oypdSeq = a.oypdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND oypdDelNy = 0 AND a.oypdSeq = #{oypdSeq}
